verses.name: Proverbs 22:21
verses.text: That I might make thee know the certainty of the words of truth; that thou mightest answer the words of truth to them that send unto thee?

verses.name: Proverbs 22:22
verses.text: Rob not the poor, because he is poor: neither oppress the afflicted in the gate:

verses.name: Proverbs 22:23
verses.text: For the Lord will plead their cause, and spoil the soul of those that spoiled them.

verses.name: Proverbs 22:24
verses.text: Make no friendship with an angry man; and with a furious man thou shalt not go:

verses.name: Proverbs 22:25
verses.text: Lest thou learn his ways, and get a snare to thy soul.
